title: Vayne Mastery...
body: I went 18/2/10 and I got an A+....how the hell do people get Vayne to level 7?

replies.body: 95% of Vaynes are 1 trick ponies, meaning they play nothing but vayne. So its pretty hard to compete with them, as they ramp up the scores.
i went like 20/0 as thresh top and i had good cs (200 at 16 mins or something like that and i got S+)

Well I got my lv 7 Vayne a week ago, and for the final token I played 2 games. I went better score wise in the first game, but in the second game I had a decent score but about 2 cs/min better, so work on the farming aspect of it.
Considering how hard Vayne snowballs in games atm due to the lack of counterplay (invisibility can't be stopped) you have to score really well to actually get anything.
224 CS like 38 mins. That might be it...
What was your cs? Give me the time as well.
Warding can also be a big factor
